findings.title: Set Fee
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax. If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.

findings.title: Whitelist Function
findings.description: Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses (for example, team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming).

findings.title: Max Transaction and Holding Modify Function
findings.description: The maximum trading amount or maximum position can be modified. Can cause honeypot.
